name: projexion
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2018

projexion is a cooperative combo game. Make as many passes with your teammate as you can and send the ball on the boss to deal exponential damage!

Controls

Controller:

  • Left Stick: movement
  • X/Y: throw
  • A/B: dash

Keyboard:

• Player 1:

  • Directional keys: movement
  • O: throw
  • P: dash

• Player 2:

  • RDFG: movement
  • Q: throw
  • W: dash

What is going on?

• Make a pass to the other player to increase your combo meter.
• Hit the boss with a direct hit to deal damage. Damage increases exponentially with your combo meter, and no damage is dealt with an empty combo meter.
• If a player keeps the ball for too long, the combo is reset.
• If the boss touches a player, that player is stunned.
• If the ball touches a wall, or if a player holding the ball is stunned, the ball is fumbled, and your combo decreases by 1.
• If the boss catches a fumbled ball, it's game over.

Made with Unity3D
